rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open entry with wheelchair-accessible ramp and storage area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, adjacent to the central courtyard for improved ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining space within the living room area, featuring open access to the kitchen.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with ample counter space and accessible work surfaces; designed for ease of movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with en-suite bathroom ensuring accessibility; located in a quiet zone considering Vastu principles regarding the direction.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite accessible bathroom with wheelchair-accessible fixtures, connected to master bedroom.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window for natural light and ventilation.
Balanced window placement per Vastu guidelines.
